name: Shoot'em Rocks
description:
Hello everyone! this is a very simple yet fun shoot em up i made while i was bored!

i might update the project sometimes

the game was made under GDevlop5 with an indie license!

Notice:

I do not own any of the songs used in game

here attached you you can see the original music Arcade Music Loop

The original creator of the music didn't in any way or form endorse this project i am using this music under the Attribution License

other songs used in the game were under the CC0 license if you still would like to be credited please contact me

with that out of the way have fun!

Windows version now realeased!
